references.paper_title: Towards image compression with perfect realism at ultra-low bitrates
references.reason: This paper introduces PerCo, the previous state-of-the-art method upon which PerCoV2 builds, making it essential for understanding the advancements.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This reference is important as PerCoV2 is based on the Stable Diffusion 3 architecture, which is a type of rectified flow transformer.

references.paper_title: Visual autoregressive modeling: Scalable image generation via next-scale prediction
references.reason: This reference is important because PerCoV2 makes comparisons of recent autoregressive methods.
This reference is important since PerCoV2 is optimized using the powerful flow matching objective.

references.paper_title: BLIP-2: Bootstrapping language-image pre-training with frozen image encoders and large language models
references.reason: This reference is important since PerCoV2 builds upon it and it is one of the feature extractors used within PerCoV2.
